main.title: Your style - our work
main.subtitle: Professional barbers, quality materials and the atmosphere of a real men's club

2.name: Modern Fade
2.description: Contemporary gradient transition with emphasis on individuality

3.name: Urban Style
3.description: Stylish casualness for the city rhythm of life

4.name: Business Charm
4.description: Perfect balance of conservatism and modern trends

5.name: Creative Undercut
5.description: Expressive style for those who aren't afraid to stand out

1.name: Well-Groomed Beard
1.description: Perfect emphasis on masculinity and character

2.name: Royal Contour
2.description: Clear lines and shape that highlight facial features

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of hair and beard care services

barbers.title: Our Barbers
barbers.subtitle: Professionals who know everything about men's haircuts and beard care

ilya.title: Senior Barber Ilya
ilya.description: Experienced barber who knows how to choose the perfect haircut and create a well-groomed beard. Ilya has a clear understanding of which haircut will suit you based on your preferences and his expertise. He has over 1000 satisfied clients, constantly follows trends in barbering, and trains masters at BarberRoom.
ilya.services: Men's haircuts, children's haircuts (7+ years), beard trimming, waxing

slava.title: Senior Barber Slava
slava.description: A master who knows all techniques: from fades to stylish long haircuts. Slava will help you find your unique style, emphasize your individuality, and make your beard well-groomed and neat.
slava.services: Men's haircuts, children's haircuts, beard trimming, long haircuts, waxing

bogdan.title: Barber Bogdan
bogdan.description: Setting style in haircuts for over 3 years. He has a high level of skill in men's haircuts and beard work. Bogdan is constantly developing, studying new techniques and trends to achieve even greater mastery in his craft.
bogdan.services: Men's haircuts, children's haircuts (7+ years), beard trimming

egor.title: Barber Egor
egor.description: Creative and skilled master with over 2 years of experience. He knows how to reveal your individuality and create a positive atmosphere during your visit. Egor is constantly learning new things, looking for creative solutions, and always follows the latest trends.
egor.services: Men's haircuts, children's haircuts (7+ years), beard trimming, waxing

liliya.title: Lady Barber Liliya
liliya.description: Experienced master with 20 years of experience. She knows all the secrets of men's haircuts, can create the perfect shape, and put your beard in order. Liliya is always open to new things, follows fashion trends, and puts her whole soul into her work.
liliya.services: Men's haircuts, children's haircuts, beard trimming, long haircuts

team.name: Yegor
team.description: Specialist in classic men's haircuts. 2 years of experience.

team.name: Bogdan
team.description: Expert in modern trends of men's haircuts. 3 years of experience.

team.name: Dima
team.description: Master of stylish haircuts and beard care. 4 years of experience.

team.name: Ilya
team.description: High-class master with extensive experience. 7 years of experience.

roulette.title: Get Your Discount
roulette.description: Spin the wheel and get a discount for our barbershop services

roulette.spinFailed: Failed to get the spin result

roulette.congratulations: Congratulations! You won a discount of

roulette.discountTerms: * Discount applies to your first haircut. One discount per phone number.

discountTerms.title: Discount Terms & Conditions

rules.firstHaircut: Discount applies only to your first haircut at our barbershop
rules.validity: Discount is valid for 30 days from receipt
rules.showSms: To use the discount, show the SMS message with your discount confirmation
rules.notCombined: Discount cannot be combined with other promotions
rules.notForProducts: Discount does not apply to hair and beard care products
rules.rightToChange: Barbershop administration reserves the right to change promotion terms

howToUse.spinWheel: Spin the wheel and get your discount
howToUse.enterPhone: Enter your phone number in the form
howToUse.getSms: Receive an SMS with your discount confirmation
howToUse.mentionDiscount: Mention your discount when booking an appointment
howToUse.showCode: Show the SMS with your discount to the administrator before payment

discountTerms.questions: * For any questions about the promotion, please contact the phone number listed on the website.
